snippet.title: Miniclip: A Day Of Slacking (Flash Game) Gameplay
snippet.description:
Another Miniclip oldie!!! Now in this flash selection, you're in the process of slacking off when you don't wanna do hard work and all. Sometimes it's best to slack, but at work, no!!!
Links below:
https://www.miniclip.com/games/a-day-of-slacking/en/
https://www.y8.com/games/a_day_of_slacking
https://www.gamesloon.com/free-other-20/catching-games-278/a-day-of-slacking-37285.html
http://www.play-to-play.com/game-123.html
https://www.newgrounds.com/portal/view/117118
https://www.thatvideogamesite.com/play.php?id=103
------------------------------
